gui.partita

Class ScreenPartita

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • gui.graphics.Finestra
                • gui.partita.ScreenPartita
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ScreenPartita
extends Finestra
    Since:
    2016-01-13 ScreenPartita: schermata partita di cliente, consente al cliente di prenotare o acquistare un biglietto di una determinata partita
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Giovanni Leo, Fabricio Nicolas Madaio
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
